mapper.sql: FROM qnaRequests a join userMember b on b.umSeq = a.userMember_umSeq where 1=1 AND a.qrDelNy = 0
mapper.select:
SELECT a.qrSeq ,a.qrTitle ,a.qrContent ,a.qrDelNy ,a.qrRegDate ,a.qrType ,b.umName
ORDER BY a.qrSeq DESC
SELECT a.qrSeq, a.qrTitle, a.qrContent, a.qrType, a.userMember_umSeq, b.umName FROM qnaRequests a join userMember b on b.umSeq = a.userMember_umSeq WHERE 1=1 AND a.qrSeq = #{qrSeq}
mapper.sql: FROM qnaAnswers a join staffMember b on b.sfSeq = a.staffMember_sfSeq join qnaRequests c on c.qrSeq = a.qnaRequests_qrSeq where 1=1 AND a.qaDelNy = 0
mapper.select:
SELECT a.qaSeq ,a.qaContent ,a.qaDelNy ,a.qaRegDate ,a.qaModDate ,a.qnaRequests_qrSeq ,b.sfName ,c.qrType ,c.qrTitle
ORDER BY a.qaSeq DESC
SELECT a.qaSeq, a.qaContent, a.userMember_umSeq, b.umName FROM qnaRequests a join userMember b on b.umSeq = a.userMember_umSeq WHERE 1=1 AND a.qrSeq = #{qrSeq}
